Package models

Class Cart

Object
Cart
public class Cart extends Object
The Cart class represents a shopping cart that holds a collection of order items. It provides methods to add, remove, and edit items in the cart, as well as calculate the total price of the items.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<OrderItem>
    orderItems
    Represents the list of order items in the cart.
    private double
    totalPrice
    Represents the total price of the items in the cart.

      private List<OrderItem> orderItems
      Represents the list of order items in the cart.

    • totalPrice

      private double totalPrice
      Represents the total price of the items in the cart.

  • Constructor Details

    • Cart

      public Cart()
      Constructs an empty Cart object.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderItems

      public List<OrderItem> getOrderItems()
      Returns the list of order items in the cart.
      Returns:
      the list of order items

    • calculateTotalPrice

      public void calculateTotalPrice()
      Calculates the total price of all items in the cart. The total price is stored in the totalPrice field. The total price is rounded to two decimal places.

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Returns the total price of all items in the cart.
      Returns:
      the total price of all items

    • addItem

      public void addItem(OrderItem item)
      Adds an order item to the cart. The total price of the cart is recalculated after adding the item.
      Parameters:
      item - the order item to be added

    • getItem

      public OrderItem getItem(String itemName)
      Returns the order item with the specified item name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to search for
      Returns:
      the order item with the specified item name, or null if not found

    • editItem

      public void editItem(String itemName, int quantity)
      Edits the quantity of the order item with the specified item name. The total price of the cart is recalculated after editing the item.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to edit
      quantity - the new quantity of the item

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(String itemName)
      Removes the order item with the specified item name from the cart. The total price of the cart is recalculated after removing the item.
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item to remove

    • displayItems

      public void displayItems()
      Displays the details of all items in the cart.
